Contact Us Events & Deadlines Path@Penn Breadcrumb Penn Student Registration & Financial Services Financial Aid Undergraduate Aid Program Penn’s undergraduate grant-based financial aid program meets 100% of demonstrated financial need with grants and work-study funds. Penn is the largest university with a program that enables eligible undergraduates to receive grant-based financial aid packages for eight semesters. The program applies to traditional, dependent undergraduate students in the College of Arts and Sciences, the School of Nursing, the School of Engineering and Applied Sciences, and the Wharton School, who are pursuing their first baccalaureate degree. This section includes general information about our undergraduate financial aid philosophy and how we build your financial aid package. We also feature data about undergraduate financial aid at Penn.
